title.value: Отечественный и зарубежный опыт аналитической диагностики вероятности банкротства субъектов хозяйствования
Nation and foreign experience of analytical diagnostics of bankruptcy risk of economic participants
Nation and foreign experience of analytical diagnostics of bankruptcy risk of economic participants

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Mikhalchenko, O.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The article presents the methods of analytical diagnostics of bankruptcy probability of the agricultural enterprises of the Republic of Belarus in comparison with the Ukrainian and Russian Federation methods. It is revealed that the methodology for assessing the financial position of the organizations of the Republic of Belarus does not take into account all the factors. In this regard, the author of the research proposes using a wider range of solvency and financial stability indicators, efficiency of working capital and fixed assets, which are used in the Russian Federation, and to calculate the recovery and loss of pay by the Ukrainian methods.
